{{zh-pron
|m=sūn
|c=syun1

|md=sŏng
|mn=sun/tw,xmd,qzd:sng/zz:suiⁿ
|mn_note=sng/suiⁿ - vernacular (surname); sun - literary (all sense, including surname, except in Zhangzhou)
|mn-t=sung1/seng1
|mn-t_note=seng1 - surname; sung1 - other senses

|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=n,pn
